en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Candra Wijaya, Badminton World Champion & Olympic Gold Medalist .

 
CANDRA WIJAYA CREDENTIALS:

- Gold Medallist Olympic Sydney 2000.
- World Champion 1997.
- World Champion Finalist 2003, 2005.
- All England Champion 1998, 2003.
- All England Champion Finalist 1997, 2005.
- Thomas Cup Team Member Champion 1998, 2000, 2002.
- Sudirman Cup Team Member 1997, 1999, 2001, 2003, 2005, 2007.
- Gold Medallist Asian Games Team 1998.
- Gold Medallist Sea Games Individual & Team 1997.
- Kopenhagen Master Champion 1998, 1999, 2002, 2003.
- Player's Of The Year 2000 Eddy Choong Award.

I am really impressed with the power of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. A while ago, I was suffering from muscle aches in my back and thigh. I wore FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant overnight and the next day the pain was gone! Now when I am playing badminton, I found that my stamina and energy has also improved. I can now play longer without getting tired. Thank you FusionExcel for such a wonderful product!
